DOC.brief_summary: We propose conduct monthly group person type 1 diabetes also withhold insulin . Subjects ask complete 2-page survey ( check-in sheet ) begin session 5-page survey ( Diabetes Eating Disorders Survey ) first session last session group .
DOC.brief_title: Support Group Surveys Individuals Who Have Type 1 Diabetes Eating Disorder
DOC.criteria: Have eat disorder Have type 1 diabetes Withhold insulin 18 year older Actively treat EDI Committed least one appointment month member individual EDI team ( RD , CDE RN , CDE ; LP ; MD ) Approval participation EDI/DM team ( RD ; RN ; LP ; MD ) Able attend 66 % group session Psychologically ready group therapy Have additional eating disorder issue would make attendance group inappropriate Not commit continue treatment PN 's EDI Not actively treat PN 's EDI Has type 2 diabetes
